item.title: Work Experience
item.author: Author
item.description: Actual Position Assistant Professor Jan 1, 2022 - Ongoing University of Verona, Italy – Dept. of Computer Science INF/01 (Informatics) Past Positions Postdoctoral Research Assistant Oct 1, 2021 - Dec 31, 2021 (3 months) University of Verona, Italy – Dept. of Computer Science Automatic black-box testing of RESTful API Supervisor Prof. Mariano Ceccato (University of Verona, Italy) REST APIs 路 Back-box testing 路 Blockchain 路 Static analysis 路 Smart-contracts Postdoctoral Research Assistant Oct 1, 2020 - Sep 30, 2021 (1 year)
